MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 postcode area of Betws Y Coed, affecting properties in Pentrefoelas and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27PM on 26th December 2020.
